episode_event_general_rulina_saida_solo/:
This is Nessa and Bea! They’re Gym Leaders
from Galar!
I’m Nessa. Nice to meet you.
My name is Bea. Pleased to meet you.
I just battled Bea earlier. She was so strong!

Thank you, but I still have much to learn.
Let’s keep challenging ourselves and become
even better!

I heard that members of the Elite Four and their
respective Champions are here as well. I want
to learn all that I can from them.
In serious mode like always, aren’t you.
Nessa here is a fantastic swimmer!

And she’s also a model on top of that! Can you
believe it? What an icon!

I’m glad I was able make some new friends on
Pasio right away.

All that’s left to do now is to show everyone what
we’re made of in a Pokémon battle!
I think I’ll just test how strong everyone’s spirit is!

We’ll be challenging all
the Trainers on Pasio!
I’m looking forward to seeing how far we can go!

As am I. After we win, let’s go out for some
dessert, shall we?
